# Notation

{{< include macros.qmd >}}

| symbol | meaning | LaTeX
|--------|---------|-----------
| $\neg$ | not     | `\neg`
| $\forall$ | all     | `\forall`
| $\exists$ | some | `\exists`
| $\cup$ | union, "or" | `\cup`
| $\cap$ | intersection, "and" | `\cap`
| $\mid$ | given, conditional on | `\mid`, `|`
| $\sum$ | sum | `\sum`
| $\prod$ | product | `\prod`
| $\mu$ | mean | `\mu`
| $\E{X}$ | [expectation](#probability.qmd#def-expectation) of $X$ | `\text{E}[X]`

: Notation used in this book {#tbl-notation-collected}
